inn1.comm: Sohail's first ball in ODIs angles away from Gibbs off a length and is left alone.
beaten. It lands on the middle and off and angles away, Gibbs is sucked into a forward prod and the ball teases the outside edge. Two slips in place.
on the off stump line, released off the wrong foot as his wont, Gibbs gets behind the line to defend

around that off stump line, Gibbs leans half-forward, opens the bat-face and guides to third man. And hello Sohail is hit by a throw from Kamran! The throw from third man had gone to Akmal who turns and tries to throw it over Sohail's head to the mid-on fielder who had come near the stumps. But the ball sails right on to Sohail's head. Ouch. He is ok, though.
fuller, on the middle stump, Smith jabs it away to the on side
well outside the off stump and Smith is not interested. The umpire, Nadeem Ghauri, is and extends his arms.
And this one sails down leg side. Is it anything to do with Akmal's throw on his head?!
Don't you worry, he is fine; hurls this one close to the off stump and Smith lets it go past him
Nice shape away. It landed on a length, outside off and moved away. Gibbs had it covered though and shouldered arms.
And again. Again starting around the off stump and moving away
deja-vu at Lahore.
Rao continues to ping that line and is getting it to swing away from Gibbs, who has so far behaved like a monk. Can he remain patient for long?
fuller, straighter, on the off stump and Gibbs eases it back to the bowler
another probing outswinger and Gibbs lets Akmal come into play.

slipping down the elg side, Smith doesn't connect with his flick shot and the ball goes down leg side. Smith looks surprised that it wasn't called a wide. The umpire must have felt that it must have brushed something although, the replays don't confirm his suspicion.
shuffles across to the off stump and tries to clip a ball on the middle and off, misses and the ball runs off the thigh pad
full and on the off stump line, Smith drives to cover
lands on a length, outside off stump and this one goes away. Smith was initially looking to play at it but withdraws his bat at the last minute. Nice variation that from Sohail.
beaten. Full and outside off, going on straight and Smith is beaten, driving well away from the body.
Slipping down the leg side and Smith fails to connect with his glance but his pad does and picks up four leg byes
full, straight, on the middle stump, Gibbs thrusts his left foot across, brings his bat in front of it and clips across the line - dangerous - to long leg.  That's the way he plays.
swinging into the pad and Smith has no problem in flicking it through square leg.
corrects the line and sends one just outside off stump, no swing in though and Smith pushes it to extra cover for a single.
length delivery buzzing past the off stump, Gibbs lets that one go past him
another outswinger, another leave and this one bounces once before it takes shelter in Akmal's gloves
lands on a length, on the middle and moves towards leg stump, Gibbs attempts a rather loose flick across the line, misses and the ball runs off the pad towards short fine-leg region
length delivery, homing in on the off stump, Smith is caught at the crease, lunges at the last minute and inside-edges it behind square leg
a touch short in length, just outside off and Smith moves behind the line to push it to the on side
fullish, outside off stump, Smith is late into the drive and goes hard at it, the bat-face shuts and the ball gets inside edge onto the pad
on a length, on the middle stump line, clipped to square leg
back of a length outside off stump, jags off a length and Gibbs leaves it, dangerously
oversteps, a front-foot no ball gives Gibbs a free hit, the balls a yorker outside leg stump anyways and Gibbs cant put away the inswinger
short and wide, angling away, Gibbs gives it the kitchen sink but connects poorly, chopping into the ground in front of first slip
good length outside off stump, Smith drives and mistimes the drive with an inside-edge towards square leg
back of a length down leg stump, Gibbs tickles it further and picks up four, Rao just straying too much on that occasion
too straight and full and Gibbs punches it sweetly back between the bowler's hand and the stumps, coming forward in the shot, and picks up four more
good length ball outside off, a hint of swing, Gibbs comes onto the front foot and drives to extra cover where the fielder does his work
too short and Gibbs pounces on the length, getting back and pulling hard in front of midwicket for his third boundary of the over
full this time and he pushes it back hard in the air, just out of Rao's reach, and the ball flies down towards mid-off
full and angling away from off stump, Gibbs comes forward and opens the bat face, steering it towards point
back of a length, jagging off the seam and Gibbs decides to watch it carefully into Akmal's gloves
too much movement down the leg side on that occasion
drifts onto leg stump and Gibbs tries to tickle it fine, but ball clips the pad and runs away for a leg bye
fuller delivery on the stumps, he shuffles and flicks it away a well-run triple out to deep midwicket, Yousuf gives chase
another poor delivery, way down the leg side
and another! Tanvir missing his radar now, spraying it down the leg side
good length on middle and leg, Gibbs turned it to midwicket
good length on middle and leg, Gibbs turns it to midwicket
on the stumps, steered to point
short in length and  outside off, Smith goes for the width and cuts but the ball bounces over the blade.
just outside off, length delivery, Smith mistimes a cut to cover region. The ball is coming a tad slow off the track.
fuller and outside off stump, Smith crashes it through point.
fullish, around off stump, mistimes a drive to left of mid-off
beaten but gets a boundary. It landed on a length, outside off stump, cuts in a touch, Gibbs pushes at it, outside the line and gets a inside-edge to fine-leg boundary. Good ol' french cut.
full and on the off stump line, Smith tries to knife through the line and hits it uppishly towards mid-on
shuffles right across outside off stump and turns a slightly slower one to square leg
that shuffle works this time. Again he walks right across to the off stump, the ball was on the middle and he flicks it away past square leg. 50 of the partnership comes up with that four.
again shuffles across and tries to work a delivery on the middle across the line but gets a leading edge to the off side.
but he continues with that shuffle. Must love his ipod (sick joke... uff! sorry!). The ball is on the middle and he picks up a single with a tickle to behind square leg
on the pads, attempts to glance but it runs off the pad
charges down the track, Rao holds his nerve and hurls it shorter in length and Gibbs punches it to left of mid-off for a single.
outswinger to the right-hand batsman and so this one curves in to Smith who is struck on the pad but just outside leg stump

huge appeal for a caught behind decision. It swung in from just outside off stump, Smith was beaten on the drive as the ball went through the bat and pad gap and Akmal lunged forward to gather. The replays don't suggest any nick. We would need a snicko too confirm that though.
gets off the strike with a push to extra cover
full in length, around that off stump, eased to short cover

appeal for lbw but going down leg says Bowden. Full in length, on the middle and leg and Gibbs gets into a tangle by thrusting his left foot across. He has to play around the front pad and fails to get any contact. The ball was moving in and would probably have missed leg stump
shuffles across but can't get his flick working and it strikes the pad high.
fuller, outside off stump, goes too hard into the drive, again the bat-face shuts and he doesn't get much power behind that shot. Sohail lunges to his right to make a half-stop
down the wicket and he heaves a length delivery over midwicket. SA chugging along nicely here.
shifts his line to outside off, full, Smith inside-edges a drive on to his pad
full in length, just outside off stump and Smith drives with the bat-face shut as usual and gets it to Yousuf at mid-on and they rush across for a quick single
fullish, angling away from Gibbs who leans into his drive and places the ball to the right of mid-off.

Run out  chance missed. off cutter that beats the forward prod and crashes into the thigh pad. The ball rolls to the off side and Smith calls over Gibbs for a quick single. The point fielder, didn't get a good look at him to see who he was, rushed in, threw but missed the non-striker's stumps. Gibbs would have been a goner; he had just reached half-way down the track.

 It was Imran Nazir who missed the chance to run out Gibbs.
on the off stump line, Smith misses an intended drive and picks up a leg bye
driven wide of mid-on for a single
Charges down the track, backing away to the leg side in the process and creams a full length delivery wide of mid-off.
another charge but this time it was short in length and he gets it to wide midwicket for a single. Bowden warns the bowler for running on to the danger area.
full and straight, on the middle, whipped to midwicket
on a length, on the middle and leg, turned to long leg
Full in length, outside off stump, left alone. 140 kmph delivery that bounced once before it reached Akmal. Hmm...
beaten. Length delivery that held its line outside off, Gibbs freed his arms but couldn't make contact. The pitch is holding up a touch and it is likely to get slower and lower.
fuller, just outside off stump and pushed to cover
Crack. Length delivery outside off stump and Gibbs took it on the up and smoked it through cover point. Quite a shot that, considering the variable bounce on offer.
lands on a length, around middle and off, moves towards off, guided to point
he backs to the leg side even as he charges out and tries a heave over the bowler's head but misses it completely.
on the middle and leg, pushes towards midwicket for a single.
length delivery, on the off stump line, driven to the off side.
attempted yorker goes awry, ends up as a low full toss on the legs and Gibbs takes out the front leg from the line and whips it through midwicket.
homing in on the off stump, driven to cover. Drinks break.
lands on a length, on the leg and middle line, worked to long leg for a single
short and well outside off stump, Gibbs stands tall and punches it on the up through extra cover. Fab strike.

fuller, on the middle and leg, worked past square leg. Smith turns for the second run but is sent back by Gibbs, who had taken a couple of steps initially, and can't beat Hafeez's one-bounce throw to Akmal. Gone. Pakistan get a breakthrough. SA 85 for 1. Smith was looking pretty good out there.
length delivery on the middle and off, defended to cover
on the middle, holds its line, worked wide of midwicket for a single
full and outside off, no spin, Kallis on the back foot and drives to cover.
drifts in the air, full and on the middle stump, driven uppishly to mid-off
another one that comes in the air and off the track, Gibbs tries to steer it to point and inside-edges to his pad
outside off stump, square driven to point
slower in the air and Gibbs is made to wait on the ball before pushing it to extra cover
retains the strike with a drive to sweeper cover
beaten Full in length, outside off, holding its line and Kallis ends up stabbing inside the line.
a tad short in length, just outside off stump, played with soft hands to left of backward point
well-directed yorker, on the middle and leg, Gibbs takes out his front leg from the line in a hurry and manages to jab the ball away.
backs to the leg side and square drives a fullish delivery through cover
on a length, spins away outside off, holds a touch and Gibbs ends up mistiming his square drive to cover
leans forward to defend a delivery on the off stump
gets a single with a drive to long off

Afridi strikes. Big wicket of Kallis. Loopy delivery, full and dipping, spinning in from the middle and leg, Kallis pushes at it, beaten by the combo of the drift and the spin, and ends up scooping it  straight to Afridi.
slider on the off stump line, pushed to short cover
on the off stump, pushed back to the bowler
full, outside off stump and de Villiers pushes inside the line and Akmal gathers
yorker on the off stump, dug out to point
full pitched, just outside off, driven to cover
another screaming yorker, on the middle line and Gibbs somehow manages to jab it away

drifts in the air again, on the off and middle, full in length, de Villiers shapes to cover drive and gets a inside edge to square leg. Afridi is bowling really well and troubling the batsmen by the indrift
just outside off stump, square driven to cover point
changes pace, flights this only slower in the air and defended to cover
its the quick one this time, slipping on with the arm and strikes de Villiers on the pad
full and outside off, driven to cover
That drift again and de Villiers gets a the inside edge on another square drive. He is playing too much inside out and Afridi is troubling him with the in drift. Chance for a lbw.
fullish, outside off, pushed to cover
full and straight, on the middle stump line, turned to square leg
gets off the strike with a dab to third man
on a length, around the off stump, de Villiers leans forward before guiding it straight to point.
fuller, just short of the blokhole on the off stump, dug out to cover
whack. Short and outside off, slapped past point
tosses it up, outside off stump, mistimes a drive to extra cover
picks up a single with a drive through mid-off
full and spinning away a touch, driven to cover point
flighted delivery, slower through the air, outside off, driven to right of long-off and they rush to collect two runs
well outside off stump, Gibbs goes back and mistimes an intended forcing shot to cover
full and outside off, Gibbs stretches across to drive to cover. Afridi didn't try to get any ball drift in that over. Constantly varying.
comes down the track and works a full delivery to Malik at midwicket

beaten by the lack of spin. Full and outside off, drifted away a touch and de Villiers was beaten, driving inside the line. Akmal whipped the bails and appealed but the batsman had not taken out his back leg
outside off stump and de Villiers tries to square drive, gets a bottom-edge and the ball runs through the vacant slip region
leans forward to drive back to the bowler
again that lack of spin troubles the batsman. de Villiers tries to work a ball on the off stump across the line and gets a outside edge to backward point
loopy, slow, flighted one, outside off, driven to short cover
leans forward to place the ball to cover point
comes in with the arm, on the middle and off, Gibbs had it covered and defends on the front foot
slightly short in length, punched toward the right of sweeper cover and they get two. Afridi is not happy with the fielding effort and makes his displeasure known.
leans forward to defend a delivery on the stumps
full and outside off stump, whipped to left of square leg and Gibbs rushes across and dives to get inside the crease.
on the middle stump line, turning in and Gibbs paddles it away. Iftikhar fumbles at fine leg and gives away a extra run
on the middle and off, worked with the turn behind square
full and straight, turned to Malik at midwicket
steps down the track, closer to the line of a delivery outside off and plays a nice chip stroke over midwicket
on the off stump line, driven back to the bowler who moves to his right to make a half-stop and the ball rolls towards Malik at midwicket .
short and spinning away from Gibbs who rocks back to flat-bat it to long off
full and on the off stump, driven to sweeper cover for a single
a tad short, punched to right of short cover
beaten. on a length, outside off stump, goes on straight and Gibbs is beaten on the forward prod
a touch short, outside off, mistimes a cut to short cover

slower in the air, flighted delivery on the middle and off line and spinning away, Gibbs is beaten in the air and then by the turn and gets a outside edge as he lunges forward to defend. The ball runs through the vacant slip region and runs away to the boundary. 33rd fifty for Gibbs.
slipping on to the legs, flicked to square leg
steps down the track and drives back to the bowler
well tossed up, driven to short midwicket
well tossed up, pushed to mid-on for a single
full and outside off stump, whipped to long leg
short and wide, slashed away to the point boundary. Afridi has been bowling a touch short in length to Gibbs and this time offers width as well.
fuller, on the off stump, defended on the front foot
and again
full and just outside off, Gibbs goes down on his front knee to slog-sweep it to wide long-on boundary
leans forward to defend.
quicker, flatter, outside off, punched to long-off
full and straight, flicked behind square for a single
full and outside off, not much turn in, driven to long-on for yet another single
full again and Gibbs again works it past square leg.
a tad short, around off stump, pushed to left of cover where Yousuf makes the stop
corrects his length and floats this one in the blockhole, jabbed back down the track
lands on a length, outside off, spins away, left alone
slower but outside leg stump and Gibbs sweeps to right of long leg
on the off stump, driven to long-off for a single. The singles are coming regularly here.
outside off stump, cut to left of deep point
leans forward to defend
tossed-up, outside leg stump, Gibbs's bottom-hand comes off the handle as he sweeps to long leg
down the leg side, wide called and rightly so
straight, turned away to the leg side for a single
tries a paddle sweep, top edge flies away behind the wicketkeeper
full and straight, Gibbs pulls out the paddle-sweep and they scamper a couple
paddle-swept for a quick two
driven back to the bowler, tries to go across the line but is deceived
flighted ball, outside off and tapped away to the off side for a single
drifting down leg, looping in, swept away past short fine leg for a four, well executed by Gibbs
defended to the on side, pops off the bat and pad
angled away to third man for a single
down the leg side, Akmal collects it well but wide is the call
pushed to the off side but no single
swept away, popped up behind the wicketkeeper but short of the fielder at short fine leg
pushed down the ground to mid-on for a single
paddle sweep comes out again, this seems to be the plan, bobs up to the on side
down the ground, pushed to long-on for a single
driven wide of long-off for for a couple
straight down the ground to long-off
tucked away to the leg side
on the off stump, taken on the front pad
pushed to cover point for a single
lands outside leg, turns in , worked behind square
leans forward, waits for the ball before guiding to backward point
full and driven easily to long-off
full again, on the middle and driven to long on for yet another single
comes down the track, Hafeez drags back the length, worked to midwicket
slipping to the pad, tries to turn it across the line and is struck on the pad
short in length and pulled to wide long on
quicker, spins in towards middle, keeps low, whipped to square leg
slower this time and worked past square leg
short in length, Gibbs waits for the slight turn to play out before punching to midwicket
short in length, just outside off, cut to point
streaky edge through vacant slip region. Length delivery that held its line outside off, de Villiers slashes at it and gets a profitable outside edge
Banged in short and de Villiers pulled it away in front of square.
fuller, hint of late movement, on the middle line,  driven to long-on
rums are coming in a deluge here. Full pitched, on the off stump, Gibbs stands and delivers. He creams it through wide mid-off region. three fours already in this over and SA have moved to 190
slower one that beats the intended dab to the on side and strikes the pad
SA are running hot here. Flighted delivery outside off stump and de Villiers stretches across to cream it through cover.
floated on the off stump, driven down the track
plants his left foot across and dabs it to square leg
Gibbs does the same thing and picks up a single.
skips down the track, reaches the pitch of a delivery outside off and drives to long-on to bring the 100 of the partnership. 100 off 114 balls.
on the middle and Gibbs sweeps it to Gul at long leg for a single.
on the middle stump line, flicked past square leg
on the off stump line, quicker, punched to right of the bowler
turns in from outside off, worked to midwicket. Two dot balls. Rare.
one more as Hafeez slows up the pace and floats it on the off and middle, driven back to him
11th ODI fifty is up with a flick to right of long leg. He gets a generous applause from the sporting crowd.
retains the strike with a drive through the on side
floated on the off and middle, de Villiers leans forward, waits before turning it behind square leg
on the off stump, pushed to right of the bowler
comes down the track and drags a lofted shot towards wide long on
full and on the middle stump line, worked to right of midwicket
Slap over deep midwicket. First six of the SA innings. Long hop on the middle  and Gibbs rocked back to pull it over the ropes.
misses a sweep shot and instead, picks up a leg bye
length delivery on the middle and leg, Gibbs threatened to come forward before rocking back to pull to deep midwicket
slower in the air, outside off stump, driven to left of sweeper cover and they run hard to come back for the second run.

short in length, spinning in from outside off stump, de Villiers tries to short-arm jab it away, misses and is struck on the front pad. It was ,however, outside the line of off stump. Interestingly, the ball rolled back to the stumps but the bails stayed intact. Fevicol could have sponsored 'em.
picks up a single with a drive to long-on
full and on the stumps, slog swept to deep midwicket for a single
fired in quickly, outside off stump, drilled to deep cover
on the middle stump line and de Villiers sweeps - almost takes out the square leg umpire- for a boundary. That was hit hard.
short in length, slower too, no pace to work with for de Villiers who pushes it weakly to right of the bowler
short in length, turning in from outside off, de Villiers shuffles across and pulls it to long leg

Almost caught by the bowler. Turning in from outside off, Gibbs, on 96, tries to work across the line, gets a leading edge and the ball pops up dangerously close to the bowler who rushes forward but can't reach it
spinning in towards the pad, Gibbs fails to connect with his clip shot but will retain the strike, courtesy a leg bye

full and dipping on the middle, turned to right of Malik at midwicket and they rush across for a quick single. Malik didn't get the release of his throw right and it bounced much before than he intended and looped high up, giving enough time for Gibbs to get across
on the middle, driven to right of the bowler
full and on the off stump, swung to wide long-on for couple of runs. On 99 now.
fullish, on the middle and off, Gibbs leans forward to whip it across, past midwicket for the single that brings up his 18th ODI ton.
full and on the stumps, driven to long-on
fullish, outside off, slashed to point
low full toss, on the middle line, pushed to long-on for a single
fullish, on the off stump, Gibbs takes out the front leg from the line, swings across the line but can only get an inside edge to square leg
full again, short of the blockhole, driven to long-on for a single
Ah! the slower one. Full and outside off, Gibbs was through with his shot early and is beaten

run out as he slips while turning for the second run. It was delivered from wide of the crease, full and on the off stump line, Gibbs whips it to left of long leg, completes the first run but slips while turning. And that leaves him well short of the crease as Akmal collects the throw and takes out the bails. End of a fab innings from Gibbs.
almost above waist-high full toss, on the off stump, swatted away to midwicket
cuts in off the length, on the middle stump line, Kemp is cramped up, jabs at it and the ball crashes high on the pad. Rao appeals but it was going over the stumps.
fuller, on the off and middle, driven to Afridi at long-on
yorker, on the middle, pushed past the bowler for a single
shorter in length, on the off, Kemp can only push it tamely to short cover.
swinging yorker, on the off stump line, stabbed away at the last minute
from wide of the crease, short in length, a slower one, coming in to cramp up de Villiers who ends up tapping it behind the stumps
yorker on the off stump line, jabbed away to point

From wide of the crease again, it landed outside off stump, full in length and cut in, Kemp pushed at it tentatively and is struck just outside off stump. It was too close for the umpire to pick in real time and the fatal finger goes up.
slips down leg side and a wide is called
outside off stump, full in length, steered through cover point. Free hit coming up.
length delivery on the off stump, de Villiers drives to long on. He was intending to swing it across but didn't connect properly
slower one, outside off stump, Boucher takes out the bottom-hand off the handle and plays it to cover
coming in from wide of the crease, on the middle stump line, Boucher arrests the front foot stride before whipping it to long leg
on a length, around the off stump, Boucher shapes to pull but changes tack and just taps it close on the leg side for a single.
fullish, on the off stump, jabbed away to left of Rao who makes the stop and threatens to throw at the striker's end
another yorker length delivery, this time swinging in towards leg stump, dug out with the help of a inside edge to square leg
another one that reverses in late, full and on the middle and off, Boucher drives down the ground and Malik fumbles as he rushes across from long off
yet another reverse swinging yorker. Boucher takes out the left leg outside the line, stabs at it and gets a inside edge on to his boot. Fab yorker that.
he continues to ping the blockhole, Boucher can only manage to stab it away to the on side. End of a really tight over. He got it to reverse swing and was spot on with the line.
slower one, full and on the middle and off, swatted away to the on side for a single
de Villiers goes downtown. Maximum. It was delivered from wide of the crease, full and straight, de Villiers swings it cleanly through the line over long-on. de Villiers is beginning to cramp-up.
a tad wide outside off stump and de Villiers slashes it away through the slip region. A 6 and a four, the floodgates are opening again.
fullish, on the middle and leg, de Villiers goes for one almighty slog sweep but gets a inside-edge on to his thigh. He is on 80 from 88 balls.

whack! six over the cow corner. A slower one but de Villiers picks it up early, takes care to get his front leg off the line and slog sweeps it over the boundary. Again he is cramped up and hobbles off in pain towards the off side. He is carrying on, though.
21 runs off the over. Full and outside off and de Villiers slices it over backward point.
full and angling in towards the pad, a swing and a miss results and the ball runs off the pad
low full toss, outside off stump, hit to Malik at long-off for a single. That brings de Villiers on strike. What can he do?
yorker, on the off and middle line, Boucher swings but can only get  a inside edge on to the pad.
full and straight, mistimes an intended lofted shot to wide midwicket
That's disappeared over the long-on boundary. A length delivery and de Villiers swings it over the ropes.
full and outside off stump, brings de Villiers back on strike with a drive through mid-off
Full and outside off, de Villiers backs away to drill it square on the off side. Hundred no 3. He pumps his fists in the air and is over the moon. Boucher gets across to congratulate.
driven to left of the bowler
backed outside leg stump and Rao hurls it well outside off stump and Boucher can't reach it
Boucher picks up a boundary. SA move to 288. Low dipping full toss, on the middle and leg, swung to the  midwicket boundary.
Straight to Younis Khan at long-off. Another low full toss, on the off and middle this time, Boucher hits it straight down the throat of Younis. One final over left to go. Can SA reach 300?
length delivery that moves away after landing outside off stump, Pollock backed away a touch and misses to connect with his drive
walks down the track and is beaten by a outswinger. Two dot balls.
yorker on the middle stump line, Pollock makes contact with the bottom-half of the bat and that meant the ball rolled slowly towards long-off, giving him enough time to collect two runs.
yorker length delivery on the stumps, driven to cover for a single.
short of the blockhole, on the off stump line, driven powerfully to Younis Khan at long-off. SA are on 292. The last ball of the innings coming up
moves outside leg, Gul follows him with a yorker length delivery, driven to left of long-on and SA end up  on 294 for 5.

inn2.comm: length delivery outside off stump, Hafeez punches it to cover. He then goes for some gardening on the track. Two slips in place.
on the middle and worked away to square leg
comes in off the good length, around the middle line, tapped gently to square leg
length delivery outside off stump and Hafeez places it to extra cover for a single
lands on a length, outside off stump and Imran Nazir knifes on the up, through cover. Considering it was the first ball he faced, that was quite a shot.
full in length, around the off stump and Hafeez steers it to third man region for a single.
hits the deck short of length, around the middle and off line, Nazir gets on top of the bounce and pushes it to the off side
Slashed over second slip. Full and outside off, Nazir stood where he was and lashed at it. The outside edge saw the ball fly away at a rapid rate

creamed away. Imran is not wasting any time here. Slightly short in length, on the off stump line, coming in a touch and Imran stood tall, adjacent to the line and hit it on the up through extra cover.
length delivery, angling in from the off stump and Imran moves back to defend to square leg
length delivery, coming in with the usual Ntini angle and Hafeez  moves forward to push it to short cover
he held the ball across the seam and hurled it on a length around off and middle, tapped back down the track.
again held across the seam and its a length delivery on the off stump line, forced off the back foot to right of point where de Villiers makes an half-stop
on the off and middle line, pushed to the off side
around that off stump, shaping away, steered to point
similar line and length and Hafeez plays it quietly back down the track
another length delivery, just outside off stump, guided to point
whipped across the line. It landed on a length, on the off and middle, Imran waited for the ball before wristing it past square leg
lands on the good length, around the off stump, Imran stays on the back foot and punches it to short cover
What a reflex catch by Kemp at short cover. Imran drilled a fullish delivery on the off stump to left of Kemp - that was travelling at some rate - who manages to catch it with both hands. Blinder.
cuts in from outside off stump and cuts Younis into half and flies to Boucher
around the off stump, guided to third man for a single
leg cutter on the off stump, tapped to left of de Villiers at backward point and they scamper for a quick single
on the off stump, full in length, defended on the front foot
beaten. Leg cutter that jagged away past the outside edge. Hafeez was lured into hanging his bat well away from the body as he went in search of that cutter
shapes away, not so dramatically as the last one, and left alone
And again. Pollock has settled into a nice rhythm here.
on the off stump and Hafeez leans forward to dead-bat it to the off side
full pitched, on the off and middle, Younis glided towards the line to play a beautiful on drive between the bowler and mid-on
full in length, on the off and middle, Younis didn't quite lean into his drive this time and just jabs at it and the ball runs past square leg
Fluent. Fullish, outside off and Younis caresses it through extra cover.

Ntini drags back the length and is immediately rewarded. Short in length, gets extra bounce even as it holds its line outside off and Younis stabs at it, bat away from the body, and can only manage to get a edge to Boucher.
hits the deck short of length again, at the body, clipped to long leg for a single
fuller, outside off stump, driven to Smith at mid-off
slipping on to the pad, flicked past square leg
outside off stump, steered to third man
length delivery outside off, played to point
another length delivery, around the off stump, Hafeez leans forward to dead-bat it to point
around the off stump, pushed to extra cover
homing in on the off stump, defended on the front foot
And again
And they continue to combust. Banged in short, at the body and Hafeez pulls it limply to square leg. Ntini has got all the three wickets.
Runs keep coming though. Short in length, outside off stump and Malik stood tall, got on top of the bounce to knife it through extra cover.
on the hips, clipped to left of long leg for couple of runs
full in length, on the off and middle line, defended down the track
on the off stump line, pushed to the off side
And again. Pollock is really keeping it tight at one end.
fuller, just outside off stump, steered to backward point.
on the off stump line, Yousuf eases it to cover.
length delivery that holds its line outside off, Yousuf pushes it to cover
fuller in length, on the middle and leg, on driven to mid-on
short in length, coming in from outside off stump, pushed to the off side
on the hips, tucked away behind square leg
a touch short in length, outside off stump, Malik forced it on the up, off the back foot, through extra cover.
short in length, straighter this time and defended to the on side
length delivery, just outside off, Malik again tries to force it off the back foot but gets a inside edge on to his pad
short of length again - after being driven for boundaries by Younis, Ntini has kept hitting the short of length region - on the middle and off, pushed back down the track

almost holed out to mid-off. It was a slower one outside off and Yousuf was early into the stroke and played uppishly towards Smith who hesitated to get forward before going back to stop. Maybe.. he could have gone for the catch; it wasn't too far from him
stifled appeal for lbw as the fuller length delivery clips the inside edge before striking the pad.
on a length, just outside off, defended back to Pollock
around the off stump, Yousuf lets the ball come to him before guiding it to point
leg cutter on the off stump, Yousuf leans forward to push it gently to the cover point region.
on the off stump line, punched back to the bowler
slashed past point. Short in length and outside off, Malik went after it, slicing it past the point fielder. The crowd love it and roar their approval
Even more ambitious. Malik walks right across the sticks, ending up outside off stump before whipping a full-length delivery outside off over square leg
Here comes the bouncer. It reared up sharply and sailed above Malik's head
Ntini strikes again. The pattern continues. Two boundaries and out. It landed short in length, on the middle and leg and Malik tried to clip it across but instead, got a leading edge to cover.
climbs from short of length, just outside off, pushed to cover
on the off stump line, coming in, turned to the on side
short in length, holding its line outside off, pushed to cover
on the middle, swatted to square leg for a single
length delivery outside off, steered to right of third man
short in length, close to the off stump, jabbed away to backward point
length delivery outside off, keeps low, steered to backward point again
at the rib cage, clipped to square leg
fuller, on the middle line, whipped through midwicket. Botha makes a sliding stop near the ropes to pull the back in.
back to short of length, outside off, holding its line, pushed to point
fuller, just outside off stump, Misbah drives to Smith at mid-off
cutting in from just outside off, punched to backward point.
at the body, short-arm jabbed away past square leg for a single
full in length, on the off and middle line, played to the off side.
cracking shot. Short in length and outside off, Misbah rocked back to whiplash it past backward point
changes length: gets it fuller and around off, steered to point
length delivery that kept low to evade the attempted cut shot and it rolled at least  twice before it reached Boucher
banged in short, outside off and Misbah pulled it to through wide mid-on
full in length, on the off and middle, defended to the off side

Now that was close. Superb under-arm flick from AB de Villiers. Yorker length to start off, inside edge that deflects onto the pads, they take off for a quick single but de Villiers swoops in from gully and gets in a direct hit. Misbah-ul-Haq just made the crease. The ball probably struck the stumps before he was in but the bails took that extra second before they came off. Saved by the frame there
full and outside off, driven to mid-off
similar ball, driven again, straight to mid-off
slower one this time, yorker length, pushed to mid-off
turned to midwicket and scampers a quick single
full length again, pushed to extra cover, straight to the fielder
a tad short in length, outside off, guided to third man
leans forward to defend a length delivery on the off side
half-volley on the off and middle, Yousuf walks across the stumps to whip it through midwicket
length delivery outside off, played to point
full in length, on the middle, worked past square leg for a single
cuts in from just outside off stump, off a length and Yousuf plays very late, opening the bat-face and guiding to point
full in length, outside off, driven to Ntini at sweeper cover
length delivery on the off stump, Yousuf again plays late and runs it down to third man for a single
almost above waist-high full toss, played to point.
steered through backward point for a single
banged in short, at the body, Misbah is late on the pull and gets a top edge towards gully region
off cutter on the off side, pushed to point
yorker length, on the off stump line, stabbed away to point
length delivery, on the middle stump line, turned to the on side
length delivery on the stumps, defended on the front foot
short and climbing outside off, upper cut to third man
fuller, on the middle and off, angling in, wristed to midwicket
leans forward to push a length delivery on the off and middle line to extra cover
on the off stump again, played to cover point
yorker length delivery, on the off and middle, jabbed back to the bowler.
slower off cutter, full and on the middle and leg, tickled past square leg
short in length, angling in towards middle and leg, worked to the onside.
Banged in short, on the off and middle, Misbah pulls it to the long leg boundary. He was late on a pull in the 19th over and nearly top edged to point and hence they are serving him a few bouncers.

And the bouncer does the trick now. It was part of the plan. It was banged in short, rearing up at the head and Misbah was late on the pull shot and top-edged a dolly to Boucher who ran back a few paces to take it.
length delivery outside off stump, pushed to extra cover
lands on the off and middle, pushed down the track
floats outside leg stump, flicked away to fine leg. Botha is a offspinner and it is slightly surprising to see him round the stumps for the right-hand batsmen
on the middle and leg, turned to square leg for a single
drifter, on the off stump, Yousuf goes back and pushes it to point
lands on middle stump line, turns in, Yousuf goes back to clip it behind square
slightly short and pulled straight to midwicket
drifting to the pads and flicked away to fine leg boundary. Easy pickings.
full in length, around off stump, eased to the off side
leg cutter on the off stump line, Yousuf adjusts to the late  movement and opens the bat-face to steer  it to backward point
on the off stump, full and straight, defended on the front foot.
angling in towards middle and leg, turned to midwicket
slower one, full in length, on off and middle, driven to right of mid-on
from round the stumps, full and on the off and middle, played quietly back down the track
on the leg stump line, tickled to short fine leg region for a single
flatter, shorter, outside off, Akmal gets a bottom edge on the cut and it bounces before Boucher
lands on the off stump and turns in slightly and strikes him on the pad. It doesn't turn in enough to interest the umpire.
goes back to cut a short-of-length delivery to deep point
flighted delivery on the middle stump line, Yousuf leans forward to wrist it to short fine-leg region
on the off and middle, skidding off the seam, defended to the on side
overpitched on the legs, Yousuf must feel that he missed out an opportunity there as he flicked it straight to deep square leg
full pitched, on the off and middle, driven straight; too straight as it crashes into the stumps at the other end
length delivery outside off stump, guided to third man for a single
short in length and Yousuf swivelled off the front foot to pull it away without any fuss. Stylishly played.
fuller, on the middle stump line, on driven to midwicket
short and wide, cut to the point boundary.
on the middle stump line, turned to midwicket
fuller and for some reason Akmal goes to the back foot and just about jabs it away from the front of his pad

tossed-up, on the off and middle, turned with the turn to long leg. Yousuf came back for the risky second run and had Boucher gathered Langeveldt's throw cleanly Yousuf would have been run out. He went to the wrong side of the stumps and the ball flew to the right of him
lands on the middle and leg line, Akmal is caught on the back foot again and is beaten by the turn and is struck on the pad. Going down leg side
length delivery outside off, dabbed to backward point
length delivery on the off stump, pushed to point
short in length, outside off, Yousuf waited on the ball before playing it late to left of third man
banged in short and it sails harmlessly well above Akmal's head
yorker length, on the middle line, driven to mid-on
angling in towards the off stump, Akmal pushes it to point
on the middle and leg, turned to midwicket
on the leg stump line, Yousuf goes right back to work it behind square leg for a single
flighted up, Akmal takes it on the full and sweeps to right of long leg
slower in the air, on the middle and leg, swept to long leg
full and on the middle, pushed to the right of the bowler.
fullish, just outside off stump, Akmal is caught at the crease, lunges out to jab at it at the last minute and gets a inside-edge to the on side
slow off cutter, around off stump, Yousuf waits on the ball before guiding it to third man
dug in short and pulled to left of square leg where Kemp rushes across to make a fine diving stop.
full and on the leg and middle line, flicked to fine leg
short of length, on the off and middle, pulled past square leg
leans forward to steer a length delivery on the off stump to backward point
tossed up on the off stump line, wristed past square leg
arm-ball outside off and Akmal is beaten on the cut.
on the middle and leg line, turned straight to backward square leg
full and outside off, swept to deep midwicket.
lands on middle stump line, turns and worked to square leg
outside leg stump and swept to long leg for a single.
welcomes him with a forcing shot past backward point. It was a length delivery, outside off and Akmal carved it on the up
climbs up from a length, outside off and Akmal tries to repeat the stroke but is beaten by the extra bounce
off cutter this time, around off, pushed to point
short in length, on the off and middle, punched to long-off for a single
off cutter outside off stump, guided to third man
full in length, on the middle, turned to midwicket
on the middle and leg, turned to square leg
swept away past square leg

another one on the middle and leg line, turned to short fine leg and Yousuf wants a run but is sent back. He would have been out if it was a direct hit and made it to the crease by the time Boucher gathered and whipped the bails off
turned to midwicket for a quick single. de Villiers fires in a throw and again by the time Boucher does the needful the batsman is home
cuts in from just outside off, steered to backward point
it was a length delivery on the off and middle, Yousuf planted his left foot out and hit it on the up to send it over mid-on. Lovely shot.
fuller and driven to mid-off
on the off stump line, angling in and steered to third man. That's Yousuf's 55th ODI fifty.
beaten. Just outside off stump, a slow off cutter and Akmal pushes outside the line
another slow off cutter, Akmal gets a inside edge while pushing forward to defend
goes right back to a floater on the middle and leg and works it behind square leg
lands outside off stump, Akmal misses to connect with the sweep shot and is struck on the pad
fuller, outside off stump, driven to right of Botha who makes a good stop
again pretty full, outside off and Akmal is struck on the front boot, going for a sweep shot
on the middle stump line, Akmal lunges forward and the ball dips rapidly on him and he adjusts by pushing it to the on side
in the blockhole - he has really kept it full this over - jabbed away to the on side. End of a tight over
full and outside off stump, Yousuf miscues a lofted drive and it falls short of long-off
charge and a miss. Akmal stepped down the track and missed a heave across the line
slow off cutter, outside off, Akmal is beaten by the change of pace and can't connect with his pull shot
114.8 kmph, floater outside off, Akmal tries to slice it away and is beaten
outside off stump, full in length, pushed to deep point
118.7 offcutter on the off stump, Yousuf is early into his drive, checks his shot and gets it through mid-on region. End of a tight over and a tight spell from Pollock
Kallis strikes right away. Off cutter, full and on the middle and off, Yousuf leaned forward only to whip it straight to Smith at midwicket.
Afridi goes for the jugular right away. Full and well outside off, Afridi has a big swing and a miss
closer to the off stump and is beaten on the drive
Ah! One dot ball and then, a six. Short in length, on the stumps and Afridi swings it over deep square leg. The crowd roar their approval.
slower one, on the off and middle, Afridi leans forward to defend to the off side.
short in length, 125.7 kmph, on the middle and off, Afridi mistimes a pull shot to mid-on and by the time the long-on fielder comes in, he jogs across for a easy single.
retains the strike with a punch to long-on
well outside off stump, Akmal goes for a cut but the ball keeps pretty low and Boucher gathers.
full and straight, chipped towards deep square leg for a single
sliced high to the right of sweeper cover. Fullish, on the off stump, Afridi backs away to the leg side and ends up slicing it high over cover
yorker on the middle and leg, dug out to fine leg
full pitched on the middle and leg, Akmal shuffled across and played a neat pick-up stroke over mid-on
length delivery outside off stump, pushed to Gibbs at cover
128.9 short of length delivery on the off and middle line, swung to right of long on where Albie makes a lunging stop
fuller, on the off and middle, driven to midwicket
on the middle stump, on a length, turned to midwicket
drifting on to the pad, Akmal can't put bat to ball and it runs off the pad to left of Boucher
full pitched, outside off stump, driven to Albie at long-on
Done in by the slower one. Akmal charged out and completely missed a heave across the line.
length delivery, on the stumps and Afridi gets under it to pull it, high and handsome, over deep midwicket boundary. That one really sailed into the skies before gravity pulled it back.
fullish, on the stumps, scooped over midwicket
Afridi is going for it. Indulging himself out there. He moves outside leg stump and punches a low full toss on the off and middle through extra cover
full pitched, on the off and middle,drilled uppishly, one bounce to long-off
leans forward to dead-bat a length delivery.
on the legs and Sohail chips it in the air to right of deep midwicket.
almost holed up to long-on. Slow off cutter, on the off stump line and Afridi hit an uppish drive towards Albie who charged ahead and threw in a dive but couldn't reach it
angling away from Sohail who steers it to third man

ooh ... bounced just above the middle stump. Afridi had backed away to the leg side and Kallis slipped in a slow off cutter that beat the intended cut. Boucher couldn't gather it cleanly as it turned after bouncing in front of him
Sohail joins in the party. A slower one, full in length and he just leaned forward to loft it over long-on. Well caught by a ball-boy there.
retains the strike with a slash to third man
yorker, on the leg stump line, Afridi misses to connect a swing across the line and it runs of the boot
bouncer on the stumps and Sohail is too late on the pull shot
length delivery outside off stump, flat-bats it to left of long-off
length delivery zips past the outside edge as Sohail has a swing and a miss
top edged over Boucher. Short in length, around off stump and Sohail goes for a pull and luckily, for him, edges it over the 'keeper.
retains the strike with a drive to mid-off
fullish, outside off stump, sliced away to right of Ntini at sweeper cover
That's a fabulous shot. Fullish and on the legs and Sohail swung it ala Anwar over deep square leg. Lovely wristy stroke.
slower off cutter, outside off, Sohail tries to late cut but misses.
another slow off cutter, full and around off, steered to point.
Yet another slower one, full and in the zone outside off, Sohail can't connect with his swing across the line. Afridi goes over for a chat.
hmm.... retains the strike with a chipped stroke to Ntini at deep cover.
The leg stump has been pegged back. Sohail shuffled across the sticks to whip another delivery over square leg but missed it completely. Useful cameo from Sohail.
welcomes him with a bouncer that sails over his head. Wide called though.
full in length, outside off, shaping away, Rao has a loose drive and a miss
short in length, landed outside off stump and cut away, Rao pushes at it and is beaten. Afridi walks over and offers some words of advice to Rao Iftikhar Anjum.
well outside the off stump and Rao can't reach it.  Again, Afridi has a few words to say to his partner
fuller, closer to off stump, swings away late, square driven to point
on a length, outside off stump and it keeps low as it moves away from Rao who pushes inside the line and is beaten
homing in on the off stump, pushed to mid-off. Now or never for Afridi
slow off cutter, 113.7 kmph, sails down leg side and Boucher makes a diving stop

Full in length, on the middle stump line, Afridi swings it to left of deep midwicket where it bounces in front of Ntini and spins past him. Now .. Ntini has been switched right across the field to deep cover!
lemon cut. Short of length, slow off cutter again, Afridi inside-edges an attempted pull shot to fine leg boundary
low dipping full toss, on the middle stump line, driven to long-on for a single. That brings Rao to strike. Can he get a single? Can SA strike?
slow loopy offcutter, full, outside off stump, driven to left of Kallis towards mid-off
Boom Boom. Fullish, short of the blockhole and that was enough for Afridi who drills it right over Kallis' head and the long-offfielder dived to his right but can't get across in time
retains the strike by tapping a full pitched delivery to the cover point region

late outswinge and Afridi gets a leading edge as he tries to work it across the line and it goes to extra cover. Afridi takes the single on the over throw. Now he walks over to have another chat with Rao
Ah! Rao says he can bat. Fullish, outside off stump and Rao creamed it through extra cover
on the middle and leg, clipped to the leg side
low dipping full toss, on the off stump line, driven to long off
cheeky, Afridi first moves down leg side and then walks right across to the sticks to lap a fullish delivery just past the diving short-fine-leg fielder
late outswinger, curving away and Afridi tries to push it for a single, gets a outside edge and the ball bounces before it reaches Boucher
banged in short, climbs chest-high outside off stump, mistimes a cut to point. Afridi can't get on strike. 50 from 29 balls
short again, upper cut over point to the sweeper cover. That brings Afridi on strike. He is on 47 from 24 balls
backs away to the leg side, Albie follows him with a yorker, driven to mid-off.

Afridi is gone. Pakistan's hopes sink. Full pitched on the stumps, Afridi backed away and heaved it straight to long-on. Gone. What a fab innings it was though. Brutal, as ever, and he did scare a few South Africans.
fullish, on the off and middle, driven to mid-off.
from round the stumps, on the off stump line, tickled to short third man and there is an overthrow
tossed-up, outside off, slog swept to wide midwicket. Ntini didn't pick it up in the fading light and it drops short of him

Game over. SA have won. Rao went down the track, drove to long-off and turned blind for the second. He was sent back by Gul but slipped as he turned back. Botha did the final rites and SA have taken the first ODI.
